title: Lamb: the story of the fat lamb industry in Australia
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, John Heyer and James Pearson
brief_description: The extent of fat lamb breeding throughout Australia is shown - crossbreeding - types of sheep. Sale yards and weir at Yarrawonga; lectures on feed growing and crossbreeding results are shown at Rutherglen Experiment Farm; sale markets, butchering and chilling. Produced to show the care, cleanliness and scientific production of the best fat lamb for the dinner tables of Britain.
